text: Tonto+ is a 2007 EP by Battles. It consists of a CD and a DVD. The CD contains the title track, remixes, and live performances, and the DVD has videos for the title track and "Atlas", another song off Battles' debut album Mirrored. The cover resembles Section 25's From the Hip. ==Track listing== ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" !Country !Release Date |- |Worldwide | |- |United States | |} |Spain | |{Tonto+++(Ilia)} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 EPs Category:Battles (band) EPs Category:Warp (record label) EPs
title: Tonto+
